actors.name: United States of America
actors.description: Global superpower with dominant military, economic, technological, and cultural influence. Leader in international diplomacy, innovation, and financial markets.

actors.name: People's Republic of China
actors.description: Rising superpower with world's largest population, second-largest economy, growing military capabilities, and expanding global infrastructure initiatives.

actors.name: European Union
actors.description: Powerful economic and political union of 27 states, representing significant trade bloc, regulatory influence, and diplomatic weight.

actors.name: Meta Platforms (formerly Facebook)
actors.description: Controls dominant social media platforms affecting billions of users, shapes global information flow, digital economy, and social discourse.

actors.name: United Nations
actors.description: Premier international organization for global governance, peacekeeping, humanitarian aid, and international law framework.
